index.short_description: Whalebird is a Fediverse client application for desktop.

home.title: UI like Slack
home.body: This client can change accounts. And these timelines are updated using streaming. When you get a notification, it is notified your desktop.

jump.title: Many shortcuts
jump.body: This client has many shortcuts, so you can control this application with these shortcuts. And you can jump another timeline to type Ctrl + k which is jump function.

theme.title: Many color themes
theme.body: You can choose the dark theme like Mastodon web and other color themes. You can customize the color theme as you like. And if your screen is narrow, you can collapse the side menu.

tag.title: Hashtag and Lists
tag.body: Whalebird can search hastag, and show hashtag's timelines. And you can create a list, and show list's timelines.

proxy.title: Proxy support
proxy.body: You can use proxy server like modern web browsers. Whalebird can load OS proxy configuration, or you can apply certain proxy only to Whalebird.

donate.title: Sponsor
donate.description: Whalebird is free software. We don't monetize with advertisement. So your donation supports this project.
